text: فَمَا كَانَ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ إِذۡ جَآءَهُم بَأۡسُنَآ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

translation.en: And their declaration when Our punishment came to them was only that they said, "Indeed, we were wrongdoers
translation.id: Maka ketika siksaan Kami datang menimpa mereka, keluhan mereka tidak lain, hanya mengucap, "Sesungguhnya kami adalah orang-orang yang zalim
